details.text: Global interconnect for 3 global loads and 4 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 3 global loads and 4 global stores.

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.

Kernel attribute 'uses_global_work_offset' not specified. Add '__attribute__((uses_global_work_offset(0)))' to reduce area utilization if the kernel will always be enqueued with a 0 or NULL global_work_offset argument in clEnqueueNDRangeKernel. Add '__attribute__((uses_global_work_offset(1)))' to hide this suggestion without affecting kernel functionality.

1 compute unit.
Kernel attribute 'uses_global_work_offset' not specified. Add '__attribute__((uses_global_work_offset(0)))' to reduce area utilization if the kernel will always be enqueued with a 0 or NULL global_work_offset argument in clEnqueueNDRangeKernel. Add '__attribute__((uses_global_work_offset(1)))' to hide this suggestion without affecting kernel functionality.

details.Clock: Running memory at 2x clock to support more concurrent ports

Additional information.text: Requested size 16384 bytes, implemented size 98304 bytes, stallable, 6 reads and 5 writes.

details.text: Reduce the number of write accesses or fix banking to make this memory system stall-free.

Additional information.text: For each replicate, 6 private copies were created to efficiently support multiple simultaneous workgroups. This resulted in 8 times increase in actual block RAM usage. Reducing the number of barriers or increasing max_work_group_size may help reduce this factor.
Banked on bits 2, 3 into 4 separate banks.

details.text: Resources for live values and control logic. To reduce this area:
reduce scope of local variables, localizing them as much as possible
